verses.verse: To every <S%H3605><s%> thing there is a season, <S%H2165><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> purpose <S%H2656><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the heaven: <S%H8064><s%>

A time <S%H6256><s%> to be born, <S%H3205><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to die; <S%H4191><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> to plant, <S%H5193><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to pluck <S%H6131><s%> up that which is planted; <S%H5193><s%>
A time <S%H6256><s%> to kill, <S%H2026><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to heal; <S%H7495><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> to break <S%H6555><s%> down, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> up;
A time <S%H6256><s%> to weep, <S%H1058><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to laugh; <S%H7832><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> to mourn, <S%H5594><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to dance; <S%H7540><s%>

A time <S%H6256><s%> to cast <S%H7993><s%> away stones, <S%H68><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to gather <S%H3664><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> together; a time <S%H6256><s%> to embrace, <S%H2263><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to refrain <S%H7368><s%> from embracing; <S%H2263><s%>
A time <S%H6256><s%> to get, <S%H1245><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to lose; <S%H6><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> to keep, <S%H8104><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to cast <S%H7993><s%> away;
A time <S%H6256><s%> to rend, <S%H7167><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to sew; <S%H8609><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> to keep silence, <S%H2814><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to speak; <S%H1696><s%>
A time <S%H6256><s%> to love, <S%H157><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> to hate; <S%H8130><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> and a time <S%H6256><s%> of peace. <S%H7965><s%>
What <S%H4100><s%> profit <S%H3504><s%> has he that works <S%H6213><s%> in that wherein <S%H834><s%> he labors? <S%H6001><s%>
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the travail, <S%H6045><s%> which <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> to be exercised <S%H6031><s%> in it.

He has made <S%H6213><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> thing beautiful <S%H3303><s%> in his time: <S%H6256><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> he has set <S%H5414><s%> the world <S%H5769><s%> in their heart, <S%H3820><s%> so that no <S%H1097><s%> man <S%H120><s%> can find <S%H4672><s%> out the work <S%H4639><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> makes <S%H6213><s%> from the beginning <S%H7218><s%> to the end. <S%H5490><s%>
I know <S%H3045><s%> that there is no <S%H369><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> in them, but for a man to rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> in his life. <S%H2416><s%>

And also <S%H1571><s%> that every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> should eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> and enjoy <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his labor, <S%H5999><s%> it is the gift <S%H4991><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

I know <S%H3045><s%> that, whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> does, <S%H6213><s%> it shall be for ever: <S%H5769><s%> nothing <S%H369><s%> can be put <S%H3254><s%> to it, nor <S%H369><s%> any thing taken <S%H1639><s%> from it: and God <S%H430><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> it, that men should fear <S%H3372><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.

That which has been <S%H1961><s%> is now; <S%H3528><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> is to be has already <S%H3528><s%> been; <S%H1961><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> requires <S%H1245><s%> that which is past. <S%H7291><s%>

And moreover <S%H5750><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of judgment, <S%H4941><s%> that wickedness <S%H7562><s%> was there; <S%H8033><s%> and the place <S%H4725><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> that iniquity <S%H7562><s%> was there. <S%H8033><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked: <S%H7563><s%> for there is a time <S%H6256><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> for every <S%H3605><s%> purpose <S%H2656><s%> and for every <S%H3605><s%> work. <S%H4639><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> in my heart <S%H3820><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the estate <S%H1700><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> might manifest <S%H1305><s%> them, and that they might see <S%H7200><s%> that they themselves <S%H1992><s%> are beasts. <S%H929><s%>

For that which befalls <S%H4745><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> befalls <S%H4745><s%> beasts; <S%H929><s%> even one <S%H2088><s%> thing befalls <S%H4745><s%> them: as the one <S%H2088><s%> dies, <S%H4194><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> dies <S%H4194><s%> the other; <S%H2088><s%> yes, they have all <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H259><s%> breath; <S%H7307><s%> so that a man <S%H120><s%> has no <S%H369><s%> preeminence <S%H4195><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> a beast: <S%H929><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> is vanity. <S%H1892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> are of the dust, <S%H6083><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> to dust <S%H6083><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of man <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> that goes <S%H5927><s%> upward, <S%H4605><s%> and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the beast <S%H929><s%> that goes <S%H3381><s%> downward <S%H4295><s%> to the earth? <S%H776><s%>

Why I perceive <S%H7200><s%> that there is nothing <S%H369><s%> better, <S%H2896><s%> than that a man <S%H120><s%> should rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in his own works; <S%H4639><s%> for that is his portion: <S%H2506><s%> for who <S%H4310><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> him to see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall be after <S%H310><s%> him?
